name: National Institute of Professional Education and Technology (NIPET)
briefDescription: Incepted in the year 1998, NIPET is India’s leading ISO certified technical educational institution with providing of Job oriented technical courses along with Soft Skills and Leadership Trainings also manages to seamlessly provide services to satisfy local needs. NIPET believes in offering the finest standards of training that is constantly updated the curriculums and adapted to the changing global scenario. Our training is geared towards ‘increasing employability’. All the trainees of our institution are certified by the Govt. departments/institutions.
